message: Let's split somewhat fairly, Bob, but slightly in my favor considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but the inflation makes it a bad deal for me in the long run. Let's be a bit closer to even, considering the time value of money.
Bob, time is money! Let's settle this now. I'm willing to compromise slightly from my initial offer.

Alice, it seems we're approaching a stalemate. I'm offering you a deal where you receive more than the last round, acknowledging the time pressure. Let's wrap this up and avoid further losses from inflation.
